THURSDAY, THE 09TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 19TH POUSHA, 1941

AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CP 56/2018 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF

THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
09.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

Bp ts ial
Crl.MC.No.142 OF 2020(G) 2 2020/KERI942
ORDER
Dated this the 9th day of January 2020

Petitioners are accused in C.P.No.56/2018 on the files of
the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Kattakada for having
allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 511 of
306 r/w Section 34 of IPC.

2. Petitioners could not appear on time as a result of
which non bailable warrant was issued against them.
Petitioners are willing to surrender but apprehends that they
may be incarcerated. Petitioners are willing to co-operate with
the trial.

Hence petitioners are directed to surrender before the
Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Kattakada within a period
of two weeks and apply for bail. The bail petition shall be
considered and orders passed preferably on the very same
date.

With these observations, the Crl.M.C is disposed of.

SD/-
ASHOK MENON
JUDGE
